title: @Meddler Lucian and Marksman Update
body: I am really sorry to bother you, but i want to know if their is anything you plan on doing For Lucian with the Marksman Update? He seems like a champion that can Be done alot of awesome things with.  I have afew ideas if you would like to hear them. But for now i just really want to know if you plan on changing anything on him as you Announced the Marksman Update.

replies.body: We're still locking down exactly which marksmen will and won't get changes in the preseason (some early confirmations excepted), so I can't give you a definite yes/no on Lucian yet. I'd definitely be interested in hearing your ideas though.

Passive: (Light Slinger) After every ability, lucians next AA is a double shot. Each ability Will trigger a different form of this passive.

Q: (Piercing Light) Active, The same...

Passive, Lucian fires a weaker round of Piercing light from each gun. (id say about 25% of the original Piercing light damage, making this 50% if you hit the same target Twice)

W: (Ardent Blaze) Active, The same... Original passive, the same...

Passive, Marked Targets temprature increases, Lucian can now shoot Two Heat seeking bullets at the target if it is in 800 range (or something like that.... This ability is somewhat Hard to hit with minions in the way and the Star shape) the damage would be like two normal autos, just the range is increased. 

E: (Relentless Pursuit) Active: The same. and this would keep your original passive of just a double shot since it helps with your ultimate.

R: (The culling) Lucian Unleashes a torrent of Shots from his weapons Hitting All enemies Within 8 Teemos (or 10 idk) away from him slowing them for 1 second each time a bullet hits the unit. Enemy champions hit are all marked, Lucian can use (Relentless Pursuit) During the ultimate, While lucian is mid dash he fires 8/9/10 shots Quickly at the nearest Marked target. (abit of burst for out bully) 

I am sorry if i did a really bad job with my Explanation. i think these would make Lucian very unique. Also the damage from his passive do not proc on hit Effects such as Lifesteal other than Relentless Pursuits. 

But yeah. i feel like this would give Lucian a better feel being the only Dual wielding Marksman (correct me if i am wrong). Most of his appearances (His Login theme and the PROJECT: Overdrive) show him shooting barrages of bullets at single and multiple enemies  so i wanted to include that.

OP?..... now that i look at it..kinda. but i hope anything helps.

Lucian's Ardent Blaze should be changed to deal physical damage. Marksmen need the synergy of one damage type in their kit unless their specialty is dealing mixed damage (Kog'maw, Ezreal).

Unlike Make it Rain, Rocket Jump, or .90 Caliber Net, Ardent Blaze does not have any crowd control attached to it. It is also Lucian's main form of poke early, and a good source of mid game team fighting power, so it should be strong in the mid game with a good AD scaling and physical damage. 

And no, the idea that it could make Lucian's mid game too strong isn't a problem. Ratio carries need to win the game in the mid game or they get out scaled.

I am a huge fan of Lucian but he seems to have lost what makes him strong at the moment.

I would suggest that you change his E to allow him to store 2 charges, much the same way that Corki can store up to 7 charges of his ultimate. Each charge would build up with the current cooldown timer on his E.

I understand there may be some aversion to this idea because of the memories of 4.12 Lucian dashing all over the place and killing everyone.

However, since then several things have changed with Lucian's kit to make this more viable. His E cooldown has been increased, and more importantly mana costs were added back to his E, making it so that early game Lucian can't abuse this movement without going OOM and thus limiting his effectiveness. Also, Lucian's damage was nerfed pretty much across the board.

Having 2 charges of E would allow Lucian to play more like a mobile AD assassin. Dash in, combo dmg, dash out. Additionally, he could use a double dash for chasing or escapes. 


Before we talk about how potentially OP this change could be I would like to point out several champions who have more mobility than this change would give Lucian.

First is Yasuo. He can dash through an entire minion wave at will and this doesn't seem to be an issue to the balance team.

Second is Kalista. She has a dash on every auto attack or Q. Also doesn't seem to be an issue.

Third is Tristana. Can jump endlessly on assist or kills. Doesn't seem to be a problem.

TL;DR Allow Lucian to store up to 2 charges of E. This will maintain his identity as a mobile gunslinger and give him some much needed power without making him too OP early game.

I am all for making Lucian a more dynamic type of marksman, focusing in on the fact that he does duel wield and making him a multi-target threat. A new W would be good. If he is going to stay at his very short range, he will need something to offer that Graves doesn't offer more of, particularly burst damage and defensive stats as someone else messaged. 

I dont have any particular ideas, but I think that mindset is a good way to start thinking about it: How to make Lucian and Graves unique.
